rules_text:
Escape–{2}{R}{G}{W}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard.
Edith Rey escapes with a flying counter on her if a creature exiled with her escape ability had flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, vigilance.
notes:
Major House Leader Cycle
Red White Green
